thread.title: Iran, Israel exchange fire in direct escalation

title: Iran, Israel exchange fire in direct escalation
text:
Iran, Israel exchange fire in direct escalation 9:37pm IST - 01:57
The shadow war fought between Iran and Israel has now moved into open conflict, and it appears that the U.S. withdrawal from the Iran nuclear deal played a direct role in the escalation. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
